title: Unexpected nil pointer with recursive function doing select
body:
by **joamaki**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
--snip--
1	package main
2	
3	import (
4		"fmt"
5	)
6	
7	type Foo struct {
8		ch chan bool
9	}
10	
11	func (f *Foo) recur(n int) {
12		fmt.Printf("%d: %p\n", n, f)
13	
14		timeout := make(chan bool, 1)
15		go func() {
16			// time.Sleep(...)
17			timeout <- true
18		}()
19	
20		select {
21		case <- timeout:
22			return
23		case <- f.ch:
24			f.recur(n+1)
25		}
26	}
27	
28	func main() {
29		f := &Foo{make(chan bool, 1)}
30		go f.recur(0)
31		for {
32			f.ch <- true
33		}
34	}
